title: Small graded card storage box FS
author: steve B

posts.post_title: Small graded card storage box FS
posts.post_content:
I made this as a prototype a few years ago, never really used it. 

It's about 12x 6 x8 inches. Built very solidly of oak with an oak plywood floor. 
Inside it's got around 10 inches of space.
So it will fit 40 SGC slabs, a few more PSA a few fewer Beckett. 
Realistically you wouldn't want to put 40 in there as they'd be hard to remove. I figure around 35 SGC slabs would be the most that would be practical.

Nice for smaller collections or just a place to put a few cards on the desk. 

$45 shipped in the US. International would get expensive but I'll ship it pretty much anywhere at cost.(US shipping is priority large flat rate, 16.85)  

I'm planning on making a few more if this sells, probably a bit lighter, and without the brass plate (And a bit nicer, I've gotten much better since I made this one.)


Steve B
